SEARCH
Package main

Interface EmployeeBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
FullTimeEmployeeBuilder, PartTimeEmployeeBuilder
public interface EmployeeBuilder

The EmployeeBuilder interface defines a builder pattern for creating Employee objects. It provides a fluent API for setting various properties and ensures that the final object is built only after all necessary properties have been set.

This interface allows for a step-by-step construction of Employee objects, making it easier to manage complex object creation processes.

Since:
1.0
Author:
DanialSamadi
